author: Dave Mosher
title: A new phone-tracing technology could tell if you've been exposed to the coronavirus — without sacrificing privacy. 130 researchers are offering it to countries for free.
description: The novel coronavirus excels at spreading because it's contagious when there are few or no symptoms. That's why governments are resorting to lockdowns, travel bans, and other economy-crippling restrictions. A team of 130 volunteer researchers just rolled out …
